column4: whats the name of the seveas css Library package? i just need to know this so i can download it
here a .deb of libdvdcss, just install it via dpkg or gdebi. probably easiest way to do it http://www.videolan.org/pub/libdvdcss/1.2.8/deb/libdvdcss2_1.2.8-1_i386.deb
you would have to upgrade to dapper, then to edgy,
